holdeasyplace.generic.holdEasyPlace.comm: Continuously triggers easy place, hides easy place failure tips, requires enabling easy place mode.
holdeasyplace.generic.disableHoldEasyPla: Disable Hold Easy Place Failure Tip
When both Hold Easy Place Mode and Disable Hold Easy Place Failure Tip are set to true, easy place failure tips will be disabled.
holdeasyplace.generic.alwaysDisableFailT:
When this option is enabled, all failure notifications will be disabled in all situations.
This can be used to prevent any alerts related to operation failures when using the easy place feature.
holdeasyplace.hotkey.holdEasyPlaceToggle: Allows players to quickly toggle the continuous easy place mode.
